DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of the study is to determine if the evolutivity of global and segmentary captation of FDG-F18, which can be measured in the wall of abdominal aorta aneurysm, is predictive of the 9 month evolution of diameter and volume of the aneurysm, measured globally and segmentary in angioscan.
DOC.brief_title: FDG PET-Scan Analysis of Evolutivity of Non-surgical Aneurysm of Abdominal Aorta
DOC.criteria: AAA with a minimum diameter of 40 mm, calculated with a standardized method No indication for an immediate surgery or endoprothesis implantation Age above 18 (except for patient under supervision) Patient having read the information letter and signed the informed consent AAA should have no other specific cause than atherosclerosis
